Room.Name: Temple Passage
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a secret passage connecting the temple altar to other holy places.
Room.LongDescription: The passage will take you to the Temple Holding Room and various private chambers. It looks like it could also become quite confusing, as it seems to twist and turn. Not all of the twists in the passage were designed by the priests. Some of these turns look like they were caused by an ancient earthquake which evidently caused the temple to be abandoned The Sacred Holding Room is directly south of you.
